page.title: 05TREFONEN SCHOOL
page.content:
{TREFONEN SCHOOL}
Trefonen school has three classes and four full time teachers.Mrs G Jones who teaches the infants.Mrs Boote who teaches the first and second years. Mrs Y Jones our language teacher,and Mr Leggatt our headmaster.Three half days a week,Mrs C Jones comes to teach part time.The secretary is called Mrs Cartright and the cleaner in charge is Mrs Booth.Mrs Booth along with Mrs Llewelin helps to supervise the dinners.Mrs White is the cook and Mrs Hughes is her helper.Nantmawr school joined up with Trefonen school. The school first opened in 1866 with 120 children now there 96 on role. In 1982 the schools of Nantmawr and Trefonen were joined two make one school.
